Header.title: Welcome!
Header.paragraph: Bobby Stomski is an adaptable full-stack developer who confronts complex challenges head-on, crafting innovative solutions that lead to impactful results. His versatile skill set allows him to excel in various development contexts while seamlessly integrating cutting-edge technologies to build robust and efficient applications!

About.paragraph: Blending a passion for technology with a background in teaching Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu has led me to an exciting career in software engineering. Mentoring martial arts students honed my skills in spatial thinking, communication, time management, and teamwork, all while shaping what would become a unique approach to analytical problem-solving in tech.
Why2: Red Cross Everyday Heroes Award Recipient

Gallery.title: UI Development in an Agile environment

Services.text: Diverse DOM and state management implimentation experience.

Services.name: Unique Perspective
Services.text: I bring a very unique background and skillset to the tech sector, please reach out if there is anything I can do to assist your team in its goals!

Testimonials.text: Among our bootcamp classmates, Bobby was a standout. His grasp of the material was unparalleled, and despite the extreme workload he was always ready to assist others, consistantly providing clear and comprehensive explanations when his peers needed them.
Testimonials.name: Emily Johnson

Testimonials.text: Bobby's contributions to our community engagement efforts were always exceptional, when he was available to work an event the entire team felt the difference. The training materials he created are a testament to his dedication and expertise, and they remain integral to our operations.
Testimonials.name: Sarah Miller

Testimonials.text: Bobby is a trusted and upstanding member of our local community. Not only has he been a coach to myself, my wife, and our three daughters throughout our Jiu Jitsu journeys, he has also house-sat and animal-sat for us. His dedication and reliability are unmatched.
Testimonials.name: Michael Brown
